text:
<@U070Q7P0W80> When your new theme is ready, you have two options for uploading it: you can either upload the ZIP file directly to your client's portal, or you can utilize HubSpot CLI for the upload.

After your new theme is uploaded, you can start creating pages under content staging. Or, you have the choice to create an entirely new draft page using the new theme. However, please note that at the end, you'll need to manually swap the page URL.
<@ULBP4M3LK> Happy to help! Feel free to reach if you have anything CMS related :wink:
